description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Twin Tiger Shark is a biplane STG/shooter with its roots in the 80s.  * TATE (Wide Screen 16:9) and Control Rotation Support * 6 Stages - 2 Loops * 2 Difficulty Settings * No Continues * 3 Weapon Types * Helper Planes * Smart Bombs  The game is a tribute to a well known STG developer company of the 80s and 90s.
description.short: Twin Tiger Shark is a biplane STG/shooter with its roots in the 80s.  * TATE (Wide Screen 16:9) and Control Rotation Support * 6 Stages - 2 Loops * 2 Difficulty Settings * No Continues * 3 Weapon Types * Helper Planes * Smart Bombs  The game is a tribute to a well known STG developer company of the 80s and 90s.
